meta.name: Life Cozy
meta.description: 温馨生活风格，奶茶色系，适合家居分享、日常vlog

base.container: background-color: #fdf8f3; color: #5c4b4a; font-family: 'PingFang SC', 'Microsoft YaHei', sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.9; padding: 22px;

header_window.style: background-color: #f5ebe0; border: 1px solid #d5bdaf; border-radius: 20px 20px 0 0; padding: 18px 28px; margin-bottom: 26px;

headings.h2: color: #6d5848; font-size: 21px; font-weight: 600; margin: 26px 0 14px; padding-left: 18px; border-left: 6px solid #d5bdaf;
headings.h3: color: #c17f59; font-size: 17px; font-weight: 600; margin: 20px 0 10px; padding: 8px 16px; background-color: #f5ebe0; border-radius: 8px; display: inline-block;
headings.h1: color: #6d5848; font-size: 21px; font-weight: 600; margin: 26px 0 14px; padding-left: 18px; border-left: 6px solid #d5bdaf;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #f5ebe0; color: #5c4b4a; padding: 18px; border-radius: 12px; margin: 18px 0; border: 1px solid #e3d5ca;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #fef6ed; border: 1px solid #e8d5c4; color: #8b5a3c; padding: 16px 20px; margin: 18px 0; border-radius: 12px;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #fdf2f0; border: 1px solid #e8b4a1; color: #a65d54; padding: 16px 20px; margin: 18px 0; border-radius: 12px;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #f5ebe0; border: 2px dashed #d5bdaf; color: #a67153; padding: 28px; text-align: center; margin: 20px 0; border-radius: 16px;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 45px; padding: 22px; background-color: #f5ebe0; border-radius: 16px; text-align: center; border: 1px solid #e3d5ca;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
